name: Image to Image
description: Transform existing images using AI with text prompts
prompt: Transform the uploaded image based on this description: {{prompt}}. Style: {{style}}. Strength: {{strength}}. Keep the original composition while applying these changes.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Source Image
fields.description: Upload the image you want to transform

fields.name: prompt
fields.label: Transformation Description
fields.placeholder: Describe how you want to transform the image...
fields.description: Describe the changes you want to make

fields.name: strength
fields.label: Transformation Strength
fields.description: How much the image should be changed (0.1 = subtle, 1.0 = dramatic)
